ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: beside which is the Garden of Refuge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Close to which is the Garden of Tranquility,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: near which is the Garden of Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Close to which is the Everlasting Paradise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Near it is the Paradise of Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Near which is the garden, the place to be resorted to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: nigh which is the Garden of the Refuge,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nigh unto which is the Garden of Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nigh thereto is the Garden of Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: near which is the Garden of the Abode,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Near it is the Garden of Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Near it is the Paradise of Abode.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: close to the Garden of Refuge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Near which is the Garden of Repose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Near it is the Garden of Refuge -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:15] near which is the Garden of the Retreat, to which the angels, the spirits of martyrs and the pious retreat;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nigh unto which is the Garden of Abode) wherein the spirits of martyrs abide.
